alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 10:28AM CDT until August 07 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... Northern Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1027 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walnut Grove, or 9 miles east of J P Coleman State Park, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Florence, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Waterloo, Zip City, Threet, Riverton, Wright and Oakland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
